name: cisco-esa-rest
label: Cisco ESA(REST)
description: The Cisco Email Security Virtual Appliance significantly lowers the cost of deploying email security, especially in highly distributed networks. Spam and malware are part of a complex email security picture that includes inbound threats and outbound risks. The all-in-one Cisco ESA (Email Security Appliance) offers simple, fast deployment with few maintenance requirements, low latency, and low operating costs.

fields.title: Server Address
fields.description: IP address or FQDN of the Cisco ESA endpoint server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: IP address or FQDN of the Cisco ESA endpoint server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Cisco ESA server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Username to access the Cisco ESA server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Cisco ESA server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Password to access the Cisco ESA server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Search Quarantine Messages
